name: Keyboard Key Character Key Cap
description:
<  But survived Keyboard Key last one...  >

In a chaotic electronics village, you're a Keyboard warrior fighting with 53 Keyboard Keys.

Use most Keys on your Keyboard to fight against electronic devices.

Use hot-swap switch technology and use various combat techniques.

Get KeyCaps with special abilities and continue to be strong.

But the risk of death is strong.

[KKCKC] is the first work of , a four-member indie game development team.

This game is still under development, and the demo version is being released for free!

Just the reviews and cheers are very helpful for us :)
